metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36386 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.1. net/bluetooth/hci_event.c has a slab out-of-bounds read in hci_extended_inquiry_result_evt, aka CID-51c19bf3d5cf.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1015-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-azure - 5.15.0-1003.4
No subscription required
